name: Call Of Crazy
description:
This is FPS game with Crazy missions. I have launched this Testing Version of this game with basic level. in that level, you can customize the number of your Enemy and Friendly Ai. Upcoming Levels will have a good amount of mission and Nice Level, Art.

Sorry for very basic Level Art of this game.'

Ai System of this Game is smart they have Different states like 1 Petrol State 2)Pursue State 3) Alert State 4) Pursue State 5) Melee Attack State 6) Range Attack State 7)Investigate Harm State 8)Flee State..

Currently, in this game, there are Four  Factions 1 Player - 2 Ranged Friendly MAX (which is an ally of player, they may follow you)   -3 Enemy Golem(Melee Attack) 4-Ranged Evil Max (Which is Enemy to all ).

suggest missions you like to play...Have a Good Day..

This whole game Developed on Basis of Awesome Tutorial On Web GTGD S3, A ton of thanks to him.
